why.title: Why choose us?
bullets: Fastest experience among personal finance apps

founder.title: Built by someone tired of overcomplicated finance apps
founder.text: I built Spendly because I kept facing the same problem: every expense tracker felt either too complicated or too limited. I wanted a tool that was fast, simple, and actually enjoyable to use — something that helps you stay in control without overwhelming you with charts, categories, or rules. What started as a small side project to organize my own finances grew into a clean, intuitive app that people around me began asking for. My goal is simple: make personal finance easy, clear, and stress-free for everyone.

youProvide.title: Information You Provide to Us
youProvide.body: We collect your email (including Google OAuth), hashed password, and any financial data you enter manually such as budgets, categories, goals, transaction amounts, and notes.

auto.title: Automatically Collected Data
auto.body: We may collect device info, IP address, usage logs, cookies/local storage data, and anonymous analytics (e.g., privacy‑focused tools like Plausible or Umami).

ai.title: AI‑Generated or AI‑Processed Data
ai.body: If you use AI features, we process text you provide to the assistant and automatically generated categories or insights. We do not use your data to train third‑party AI models.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.body: We use your information to create and manage your account, store financial data securely, provide budgeting and tracking features, generate AI assistance and insights, personalize your experience, maintain and improve the Service, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

storage.title: How Your Information Is Stored
storage.body: Your data is stored via Supabase with HTTPS during transfer and encrypted storage for sensitive information. Passwords are hashed using industry‑standard algorithms and cannot be recovered in readable form.

aiPrivacy.title: AI Processing and Data Privacy
aiPrivacy.body: When you use AI features, data you submit may be sent to trusted AI providers and is used only to generate the requested output. Data is not stored by these providers for training purposes, and we avoid retaining AI logs with sensitive information.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.body: We use cookies and local storage to maintain sessions, remember login state, improve performance, and analyze overall usage patterns. Disabling cookies may affect functionality.

share.title: When We Share Information
share.body: We share data only with service providers (hosting, analytics, authentication), AI processing providers when you request AI features, and legal authorities when required. We do not share your financial information for advertising purposes.

payments.title: Payments
payments.body: We use Paddle.com for payments and subscriptions. Paddle acts as the Merchant of Record. When you make a purchase, you agree to Paddle’s Terms and Privacy Policy. We do not store your full credit card information on our servers.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.body: We keep your data while your account is active. Upon deletion, all personal and financial data in Supabase is permanently removed, session and authentication tokens are revoked, and AI inputs are not retained after processing.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, export, or restrict processing of your data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

children.title: Children’s Privacy
children.body: Spendly is not intended for children under 16, and we do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.body: We may update this Privacy Policy. The “Last Updated” date reflects the latest version. Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: For questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, contact us at: support@getspendly.net

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.body: By accessing or using Spendly (the Service), you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Service. Spendly is operated by Spendly.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
eligibility.body: You must be at least 16 years old to use Spendly. By using the Service, you confirm that you meet this requirement.

description.title: 3. Description of the Service
description.body: Spendly is a personal finance management app. You can add expenses and income, create budgets and categories, receive insights and analytics, access optional AI features, and sync data across devices. Spendly does not connect to banks and does not provide official financial advice.

registration.title: 4.1 Registration
registration.body: Create an account using email/password or Google OAuth. Provide accurate information and keep it up to date.

security.title: 4.2 Account Security
security.body: You are responsible for confidentiality of credentials and all activity under your account. Notify us immediately of unauthorized access.

orderProcess.title: Order Process & Merchant of Record
orderProcess.body: Our order process is conducted by our online reseller Paddle.com. Paddle.com is the Merchant of Record for all our orders. Paddle provides all customer service inquiries and handles returns.

pricing.title: 5.1 Pricing
pricing.body: Spendly offers a Pro subscription billed at $7/month. Pro may include unlimited budgets, advanced analytics, AI insights, priority updates, and extra customization.

billing.title: 5.2 Billing
billing.body: Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled before the next cycle.

refunds.title: 5.3 Refunds
refunds.body: No refunds for partial or unused periods unless required by law.

aiUse.title: 6. Use of AI Features
aiUse.body: AI‑powered functions (insights, categorization, chat) are informational only. AI may produce incorrect or incomplete information; outputs are not financial, legal, or tax advice. You are responsible for decisions based on AI content.

userContent.title: 7. User Content
userContent.body: You retain ownership of data you add (expenses, income, budgets, categories). You grant Spendly a limited, non‑exclusive license to process your data solely to provide the Service.

storage.title: 8. Data Storage & Security
storage.body: Spendly uses Supabase for storage with encryption in transit and at rest. No system is perfectly secure; we cannot guarantee absolute protection from unauthorized access. See our Privacy Policy for details.

acceptableUse.title: 9. Acceptable Use
list: Do not misuse the Service for illegal purposes
Do not attempt to access other users’ data
Do not reverse‑engineer or interfere with servers/APIs
Do not use automated tools (scrapers/bots) without permission

availability.title: 10. Availability & Updates
availability.body: We may update, modify, or discontinue parts of the Service at any time (features, pricing, interface, AI functionality). We are not liable for downtime or interruptions.

thirdParty.title: 11. Third‑Party Services
thirdParty.body: Spendly uses third parties including Supabase (auth & DB), Google OAuth (optional login), and AI providers (OpenAI or others). Your use is subject to their terms.

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.body: We may suspend or terminate your account for violations, suspected fraud/abuse, or risks to others. You may delete your account at any time from settings.

liability.title: 13. Limitation of Liability
liability.body: Spendly is provided ‘AS IS’ without warranties. To the maximum extent permitted by law, Spendly is not liable for lost profits, inaccurate AI outputs, data loss, errors, or interruptions.

disclaimer.title: 14. Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: Spendly does not provide financial, legal, accounting, or tax advice. All insights and analytics are informational only.

law.title: 15. Governing Law
law.body: These Terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where your company is registered (e.g., Estonia). This may be updated later.

changes.title: 16. Changes to Terms
changes.body: We may update these Terms at any time. If changes are significant, we may notify users via email or in‑app notification. Continued use after changes means acceptance.

digitalProducts.title: 1. Digital Products
digitalProducts.body: Spendly provides digital services (software as a service). Due to the nature of digital content, we generally do not offer refunds once the subscription period has started and the service has been accessed.

moneyBack.title: 2. 14-Day Money-Back Guarantee
moneyBack.body: If you are not satisfied with Spendly Pro, you may request a no-questions-asked full refund within 14 days of your initial purchase (monthly $7, yearly $49, or lifetime $99). Please contact us at hello@getspendly.net with your order number.
moneyBack.note: Note: This applies only to your first purchase.

cancellations.title: 3. Cancellations
cancellations.body: You can cancel your subscription at any time in your account settings. Your access to Pro features will continue until the end of the current billing period. No partial refunds are given for unused time.

merchantOfRecord.title: 4. Merchant of Record
merchantOfRecord.body: All refund requests are processed by our Merchant of Record, Paddle.com.
